book.name: eoffer_emod
book.title: eOffer/eMod Help Center
book.body:
Featured Additions

Below are featured articles we would like to bring to your attention.

page.name: fpt-part-1
page.title: Filling out the Getting Started Tab
page.body:
The Getting Started Tab is your entryway into the on screen pricing data entry screen. This is where you establish your list of products, beginning with entering their Manufacturer Part Number then their Manufacturer name.

On the following tabs, you will be able to enter detailed information about the products you list here.

presentation_slide_page/example_presentation/first_slide
